company_context: Lead generation for POS systems targeting small businesses in the Canadian restaurant and retail sectors, focusing on owners, decision-makers, operations managers, IT and finance managers, with a special emphasis on bilingual markets in Quebec.

priority_tiers.tier_name: Priority 1 Owner Decision Maker Level Restaurants and Retail Canada
priority_tiers.tier_description: Targets small business owners and top-level decision makers such as owners, founders, presidents, and partners in restaurants and retail sectors in Canada for direct influence on purchasing decisions.

queries.description: Small business owners in restaurants across Canada
Small business owners in retail across Canada
Founders of restaurant businesses in Canada
Founders of retail businesses in Canada
Presidents of restaurant companies in Canada
Presidents of retail companies in Canada
Partners in restaurant businesses in Canada
Partners in retail businesses in Canada

priority_tiers.tier_name: Priority 2 Manager Operations Level Small Business Focus
priority_tiers.tier_description: Targets managerial roles such as general managers, operations managers, and store managers in independent Canadian restaurants and retail, focusing on those who oversee daily operations and could influence purchasing decisions.

queries.description: General managers in restaurants across Canada
General managers in retail businesses across Canada
Operations managers in restaurant businesses in Canada
Operations managers in retail businesses in Canada
Store managers in independent retail businesses in Canada
Store managers in independent restaurant businesses in Canada

priority_tiers.tier_name: Priority 3 Technology IT Finance Decision Makers Early Tech Adopters
priority_tiers.tier_description: Targets IT, finance, and technology managers who are likely involved in the selection and adoption of POS technology in small Canadian restaurants and retail companies.

queries.description: Information technology managers in restaurants across Canada
Information technology managers in retail businesses across Canada
Finance managers in restaurant businesses in Canada
Finance managers in retail businesses in Canada
Technology managers in restaurant businesses in Canada
Technology managers in retail businesses in Canada

priority_tiers.tier_name: Priority 4 French Speaking Bilingual Markets Quebec Focus
priority_tiers.tier_description: Focuses on French-speaking markets in Quebec to provide bilingual POS solutions by targeting owners, founders, and general managers in Quebec's restaurant and retail sectors.

queries.description: Owners of restaurant businesses in Quebec
Owners of retail businesses in Quebec
Founders of restaurant businesses in Quebec
Founders of retail businesses in Quebec
General managers of restaurant businesses in Quebec
General managers of retail businesses in Quebec

usage_instructions: Begin outreach campaigns prioritizing Priority 1 queries focusing on Owners and Founders for maximum decision-maker engagement.
Rotate queries to create diverse daily outreach batches targeting up to 10 leads per day, maintaining priority order from 1 to 4.
Leverage Priority 2 queries to connect with operational managers who can influence POS system adoption.
Use Priority 3 queries to reach technology and finance decision-makers in small businesses likely to be early adopters of new POS technology.
Target Priority 4 queries when focusing on bilingual markets in Quebec for tailored POS solutions.
Ensure LinkedIn searches use these keywords verbatim for best results while filtering for small and independent businesses as appropriate.
Monitor lead volume to confirm that each query yields at least 100 relevant leads and adjust as necessary.
